title: real bad la past 2 days
body: Hey guys, i've been having some real bad lag for the past 2 days, spiking significantly in fights and skirmishes. i've tried virtually everything; reseting router, disconnecting everything else from the internet. Unfortunately im with dodo, but like i said only been happening the past couple of days and only with league. Was going to try repairing it but i cant find the client repair. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Update: I ran the client repair last night, didnt fix anything. Gonna try Hermits thing and see if that helps.

Ensure that you're on the Windows 8 Start Screen.
Simply type cmd and the Windows search bar will appear on the right hand side with search results.
Right click on Command Prompt and click Run as administrator.
Type in the command ipconfig /flushdns

Running as an admin is important.

I suggest you change your DNS. Dodo's default one ain't that great.

Have you made sure there's no nasty background processes hogging up the network with automatic updates or something like that?

I'm having the same kind of issues with iiNet, went from 33-37 stable ping, even while watching a stream at high quality to 200-350 ping, mines been for about 2-5 days. I've been working a lot so I haven't been able to play much.  also on 8.1 windows.. if that makes any difference. 

Also, I disabled firewall it did nothing.

Yeah im on 8.1 as well. But i dont think that would have much on impact.

Also my firewall is disabled as well. Not running any scans or anything, and i removed them to guarantee this fact.

Fixed my issue

Windows+R

''cmd /k ipconfig /all''

''flushdns''

Enter game.

Profit
Wooh, able to login on my actual account. Yeah just showing I'm on oce
